TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ResourceExpressionFields extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含來自剖析的資源運算式之欄位。

span.span: Contains the fields from a parsed resource expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資源運算式中包含的值剖析頁面時，不會剖析與執行個體中儲存類別。When a page is parsed, the values contained in a resource expression are parsed and stored in an instance of the class. 這物件包含兩個欄位和。This object contains two fields, and . 這些欄位取自 < 資源中的運算式是明確的值 (`<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>`) 或隱含 (`meta:resourcekey="ResourceKey"`) 表單。These fields are drawn from the values of a resource expression in either the explicit (`<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>`) or implicit (`meta:resourcekey="ResourceKey"`) form. 屬性會識別對應至資源檔資源的類別名稱。The property identifies the class name of a resource that is mapped to a resource file. 例如，若要參考資源檔，名為 Financial.resx 或當地語系化的版本，例如 Financial.en GB.resx，資源運算式會顯示為`<%$ Resources: Financial, ResourceKey %>`。For example, to reference a resource file named Financial.resx, or a localized version such as Financial.en-GB.resx, the resource expression would appear as `<%$ Resources: Financial, ResourceKey %>`. 剖析之後,屬性會傳回 「 財務 」 做為其值。After parsing, the property would return "Financial" as its value. 屬性會識別要從檔案擷取的特定索引鍵/值組。The property identifies the particular key/value pair to be retrieved from the file. 如果 Financial.resx 檔案包含金鑰，稱為`Currency`，無法指定值與資源運算式`<%$ Resources: Financial, Currency %>`。If the Financial.resx file contains a key called `Currency`, that value could be specified with the resource expression `<%$ Resources: Financial, Currency %>`. 剖析之後,屬性會傳回"Currency"做為其值。After parsing, the property would return "Currency" as its value. 透過剖析資源運算式方法。The resource expression is parsed through the method. > [!CAUTION] > 機密資訊不應該儲存在資源檔。Sensitive information should not be stored in a resource file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClassKey As String
public: property System::String ^ ClassKey { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得剖析的資源運算式之類別識別碼。

span.span: Gets the class key for a parsed resource expression.

value.span: ，包含類別識別碼，如果尚未設定類別識別碼則為 。

span.span: A containing the class key, or if the class key has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回剖析的資源運算式的類別索引鍵。This method returns the class key for a parsed resource expression. 類別索引鍵代表資源檔的名稱，而是在表單的運算式中指定逗號 （，） 之前的值`<%$ Resources: [Namespace.]ClassKey, ResourceKey $>`。The class key represents the name of the resource file, and is the value specified before the comma (,) in an expression of the form `<%$ Resources: [Namespace.]ClassKey, ResourceKey $>`. 資源類別的命名空間值是選擇性的。A namespace value for the resource class is optional. 提供命名空間時，會將命名空間和類別索引鍵傳回在屬性。When a namespace is provided, the namespace and the class key are returned in the property. 類別索引鍵不能包含空格或雙位元組字元集 (DBCS)。The class key cannot contain spaces or double-byte character sets (DBCS). 若要參考名為 Financial.resx 或當地語系化的版本，例如 Financial.en GB.resx 資源檔，您會在加入資源運算式 <`%$ Resources: Financial, ResourceKey %>`。To reference a resource file named Financial.resx or a localized version such as Financial.en-GB.resx, you would include the resource expression <`%$ Resources: Financial, ResourceKey %>`. 剖析之後,屬性會傳回 「 財務 」 做為其值。After parsing, the property would return "Financial" as its value. > [!CAUTION] > 機密資訊不應該儲存在資源檔。Sensitive information should not be stored in a resource file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ResourceKey As String
public: property System::String ^ ResourceKey { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得剖析的資源運算式之資源索引鍵。

span.span: Gets the resource key for a parsed resource expression.

value.span: ，包含資源索引鍵，如果尚未設定資源索引鍵則為 。

span.span: A containing the resource key, or if the resource key has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回剖析的資源運算式之資源索引鍵。This method returns the resource key for a parsed resource expression. 資源索引鍵會是以下格式的運算式中指定逗號 （，） 之後的值`<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>`。The resource key is the value specified after the comma (,) in an expression of the form `<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>`. 屬性會識別對應至類別索引鍵的資源檔內的特定索引鍵/值組。The property identifies a particular key/value pair within the resource file mapped to the class key. 例如，如果名為 Financial.resx 包含金鑰，稱為`Currency`，無法指定值與資源運算式`<%$ Resources: Financial, Currency %>`。For example, if a file named Financial.resx contains a key called `Currency`, that value could be specified with the resource expression `<%$ Resources: Financial, Currency %>`. 剖析之後,屬性會傳回"Currency"做為其值。After parsing, the property would return "Currency" as its value. > [!CAUTION] > 機密資訊不應該儲存在資源檔。Sensitive information should not be stored in a resource file.
